title: The Things I Do for You
description: Man Wh-reAsshole.Player. I’ve heard it all. But it’s not my fault that I get a lot of attention. I make a lot of money and I have a really big… ego. Women love me almost as much as I love them.Except the only one who has ever made me want more.She’s independently wealthy and hates my guts. There’s nothing I can offer a woman like her. Fancy dinners and diamonds won’t impress this one.Until I find out there’s one thing she wants that I can give her. A baby.
author: M. Malone
